Enumeration Type Documentation

enum eolActionTypes

an eolModel type contains all the possible graphics and animation information that is needed for an animated object. Like sprites and models themselves, a single actor object can be referenced by many.

Enumerator:
eolActionLoop 

Action is meant to loop back to the begining, ie: walk

eolActionPass 

Action is meant to make a pass and then end, ie: attack

eolActionOsci 

Action is meant to oscillate between begin and end, ie: idle

void eol_model_draw ( eolModel *  model,
eolVec3D  position,
eolVec3D  rotation,
eolVec3D  scale,
eolVec3D  color,
eolFloat  alpha,
eolUint  frame 
)

draw the model under the current conditions

Parameters:
model pointer to the model to draw
position the place to draw the model
rotation how the model is rotated
scale how the model is scaled
color color shifting of the model (1,1,1) is no change.
alpha the tranlucency of the model 0 is clear, 1 is opaque
frame the frame to draw this model at

eolModel* eol_model_load ( char *  filename  ) 

loads an model from file and returns a pointer to it. based on the file information, it will also load up mesh, sprite, etc data.

Parameters:
filename the model file to load
Returns:
a pointer to the loaded model file or NULL if not found or error
